const malbec = {
  grape: ['Malbec'],
  style: 'Red',
  drinkingTemperature: 'Room Temperature',
  countries: ['Argentina', 'France', 'Chile', 'USA', 'South Africa', 'Australia', 'Italy'],
  dominantFlavors: ['Plum', 'Blueberry', 'Vanilla', 'Tabacco', 'Cocoa'],
  possibleFlavors: {
    fruits: ['Cherry', 'Black Raspberry'],
    dryFruits: ['Raisin', 'Prune'],
    florals: ['Wild Iris'],
    herbs: ['Sage', 'Yerba Mate'],
    spices: ['Cinnamon', 'Baking Spices', 'Milk Chocolate'],
    earthFlavors: ['Clay Pot'],
    others: []
  }
}

const pinotNoir = {
  grape: ['Pinot Noir'],
  style: 'Red',

  countries: ['Argentina', 'France', 'Chile', 'USA', 'South Africa', 'Australia', 'Italy'],

    herbs: ['Dried Herbes'],
    spices: ['Cinnamon', 'Baking Spices', 'Milk Chocolate', 'Brown Sugar', 'Cola', 'Allspice'],
    earthFlavors: ['Truffle', 'Potting Soil', 'Dried Leaves', 'Tabacco', 'Gun Smoke', 'Cocoa'],
    others: ['Cream', 'Toasted Bread']
  }
}

  grape: ['Merlot'],
  style: 'Red',
  drinkingTemperature: 'Room Temperature',

  possibleFlavors: {

    dryFruits: ['Fig', 'Fruit Cake'],
    florals: ['Violet'],
    herbs: ['Bay Leafe', 'Sage', 'Anise'],
    spices: ['Toffee', 'Coffee', 'Cedar', 'Incense', 'Backing Spices', 'Chocolate', 'Vanilla'],
    earthFlavors: ['Clay Pot', 'New Leather', 'Potting Soil'],
    others: ['Cream']
  }
}

const cabernetSauvignon = {
  grape: ['Cabernet Sauvignon'],
  style: 'Red',
  drinkingTemperature: 'Room Temperatur',

    dryFruits: ['Prune', 'Fig'],
    florals: ['Violet', 'Eucalyptus'],
    herbs: ['Mint', 'Oregano', 'Black Pepper', 'Dried Herbs', 'Jalapeño'],
    spices: ['Coffee', 'Mocha', 'Cocoa Nib', 'Vanilla', 'Nutmeg', 'Toffee', '', 'Pipe Tabacco'],
    earthFlavors: ['Wet Gravel', 'Graphite', 'Pencil Lead', 'Clay Dust', 'Charcoal'],
    others: ['Smoke', 'Leather']
  }
}

const syrah = {
  grape: ['Syrah'],
  style: 'Red',
  drinkingTemperature: 'Room Temperature',

    dryFruits: ['Fruit Cake', 'Dried Cranberry'],
    florals: ['Lavender', 'Eucalyptus'],

}

const gewürztraminer = {
  grape: ['Gewürztraminer'],
  style: 'White',
  drinkingTemperature: 'Cold',
  countries: ['France', 'Germany', 'Italy', 'Austria', 'Australia', 'Hungeria'],

}

  grape: ['Riesling'],

}

const WineDB = {malbec: malbec, pinotNoir: pinotNoir, merlot: merlot, cabernetSauvignon
, syrah: syrah, gewürztraminer: gewürztraminer, riesling:riesling};

export default WineDB;
